events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request involves a refund for a purchased item due to size issues and dissatisfaction.
Assigning this refund request to the returns department for further processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund faster?
Sure, my order number is 12345678, and I want to return the jacket because it is too small and uncomfortable to wear.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process right away. Please send the jacket back to us using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid label, it makes the return process much easier.
The refund request has been logged, and the return label sent. Once we receive the jacket, your money will be refunded within 5 business days.
We are following up to ensure you have sent the jacket back and to confirm if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, I sent the jacket yesterday via the prepaid label, thank you again for your help.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
